item.title: Configuring Envoy Logs and Taps
item.description: Photo by Kazuky Akayashi on Unsplash Getting Started with Envoy & Open Policy Agent — 08 — Learn how to configure Envoy’s access logs and taps for capturing full requests & responses This is the 7th Envoy & Open Policy Agent Getting Started Guide. Each guide is intended to explore a single feature and walk through a simple implementation. Each guide builds on the concepts explored in the previous guide with the end goal of building a very powerful authorization service by the end of the series.
